summary: Documentary about the entire career of Daft Punk, from their start in early 90's with their first group called Darlin', until their grammy awards in 2014. We learn how the artists have ... See full summary »
cast: Thomas Bangalter|Guy-Manuel De Homem-Christo|Skrillex|Jean-Daniel Beauvallet|Daniel Dauxerre|Serge Nicolas|Pascal Bertin|Eren|Stuart McMillan|Dave Clarke|Antoine Ressaussière|Todd Edwards|Pedro Winter|Giorgio Moroder|Eric Chedeville|Pete Tong|Emmanuel de Buretel|Maya Masseboeuf|Michel Gondry|Pharrell Williams|Tony Gardner|Megan Buerger|Leiji Matsumoto|Kanye West|Michelangelo Matos|Gildas Loaëc|Nile Rodgers|Joseph Trapanese|Peter Franco|Paul Williams|John McGuire|Peter Lindbergh

title: Daft Punk Unchained
